Package com.openclassroom.safetynet.repository

Class JsonRepository

java.lang.Object
com.openclassroom.safetynet.repository.JsonRepository
@Repository public class JsonRepository extends Object
Repository for managing JSON data. This class provides methods for saving, loading, and retrieving data from a JSON file.

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonRepository

      public JsonRepository()

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      public void saveData(TypeOfData typeOfData, List<Object> data)
      Saves data to the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      typeOfData - The type of data to save. This is used to determine the correct key in the JSON file.
      data - The list of data objects to save.
      Throws:
      DataSavingException - If an error occurs while saving the data to the JSON file.

    • loadJsonAllData

      public Map<String,List<Object>> loadJsonAllData()
      Loads all data from the JSON file.
      Returns:
      A map containing all data from the JSON file.
      Throws:
      DataLoadingException - If an error occurs while loading the data from the JSON file.

    • loadTypeOfData

      public List<Object> loadTypeOfData(TypeOfData typeOfData)
      Returns the path to the JSON file. The path is determined based on whether the "test.mode" system property is set to "true". If it is, the test file path is used; otherwise, the regular file path is used.
      Parameters:
      typeOfData - The type of data to load.
      Returns:
      The path to the JSON file.
